original_title: Sri Lanka spot opens at 306.50/307.25 to US dollar, bond yields up
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka spot opened at 306.50/307.25 to the US dollar on Thursday unchanged from its last close on Wednesday, while bond yields were slightly up.
The one month spot was quoted at 309.00/310.50 rupees to the US dollar.
“Only the 2025 maturity is quoted in the morning while all other rates remaining unchanged from yesterday’s closing” a dealer said.
A bond maturing on 01.05.2025 was quoted at 27.o0 percent, up from yesterday’s 26.50/70 percent.
